ygData.subject: Re: Camping, a solution
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm I think I like this idea better than mine, for the sole reason that this idea is MUCH easier to implement than my quest based idea. O.K. everyone you know
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm I think I like this idea better than mine, for the sole reason that
this idea is MUCH easier to implement than my quest based idea.

O.K. everyone you know what you have to do hit /feedback

First thing I do when I log in tonight will be mention this idea and where I
got it from. Maybe a Verant employee will join the list if we keep giving
them good ideas

While your at it make sure you mention the adding of Dragoon to DE warriors
of level 45 plus and Sir to Paladins who do the Test of Truth Quest :).

Sorry to keep harping on this point, but Verant will do nothing if we all
dont feedback. They will do something if more than one person hits the
feedback button. I know this from personal experience.

> ----------
> From: Jynxx[SMTP:Jynxx@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 5:11 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Camping, a solution
>
> From: "Jynxx" <Jynxx@...>
>
> YES!!!!!!!!!!!!!
> That's what we need! A random item spawn.....I'll even take it one step
> further:
> Lets say that said sword is on a level 45 person...so we'll call that a
> 'level 45 item' it can then spawn to any level 45+ NPC in all of the zone,
> or even norrath. That would make people have to travel A LOT to find items
> they want, and would completely prevent camping for items altogether. That
> way if you really wanted an item bad enough, your group had to go search
> for
> it...not just sit sround and wait for it....that to me is not even
> role-playing.
> Just my 2 cents.
>
> Tyveris
>
